meaningMnemonic: Animals <kanji>exit</kanji> the mountains into your land and never seem to <kanji>die</kanji>! They end up <vocabulary>appearing frequently</vocabulary> in your garden, eating all your yummy carrots and watermelons, and then make their exit back into the hills. They're <vocabulary>infesting</vocabulary> your home now and you don't know what to do!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
